data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Jarvis island, United States Minor Outlying Islands, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jarvis island, United States Minor Outlying Islands
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 40 believers in the state of Jarvis island with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Jarvis island who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Jarvis island, United States Minor Outlying Islands find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Jarvis island, United States Minor Outlying Islands to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Jarvis island to agree with you and with one another.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Jarvis island, United States Minor Outlying Islands. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
